entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-06-25
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • `double.IsPow2` reports incorrectly for subnormal numbers #88023
  • EqualityComparer<string>.Default.Equals is never inlined #88021
    Future
  • [API Proposal]: Task.WaitForEventAsync #88020
  • [API Proposal]: Add IEnumerable<T>.ToReadOnlyList() and ToReadOnlyCollection() extension methods #88018
  • Custom ILLinker substitutions for feature switches don't seem to work on .NET 8 #88015
  • Setting breakpoint in managed function using lldb #88014
  • why Conserve memory dont have in runtimeconfig.json #88013
  • NativeRuntimeEventSource behaving poorly in conjunction with other providers #88011

Closed

  • [API Proposal]: Uri : ISpanFormattable #87151
    8.0.0
  • Unable to retrieve English abbreviation of Japanese era names #88016
  • [ComInterfaceGenerator] Custom enum return type in base interface unrecognized when processing derived interface #87915
    8.0.0
  • The regular expression does not return a greedy result. #87976

PullRequests

Created

  • minor regex cleanup #88026
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions
  • Pass exact context to getMethodInfo #88025
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix TimeProvider Timer with Infinity Timeout #88024
    area-System.DateTime, 8.0.0
  • Add newguid.bat/sh to update jiteeversionguid.h #88022
    area-CodeGen-coreclr

Merged

  • [RISC-V][JIT] Disable promotion for splitted args #87855
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • Add Uri : ISpanFormattable #88012
    area-System.Net, new-api-needs-documentation

Updated

  • Optimize scalar conversions with AVX512 #84384
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-avx512
  • Remove more `ASG` terminlogy from the codebase #86760
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Unify Default Comparer logic #88006
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Vectorize Enumerable.Range initialization, take 2 #87992
    area-System.Linq, community-contribution
  • Read/Write Big/LittleEndian support for Guid #87993
    area-System.Runtime, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Added ArrayBufferWriter<T>.ResetWrittenCount() #88009
    area-System.Buffers, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • [ios][tests] Run the Mono and Native AOT iOS samples as functional tests on Helix #87773
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, area-Infrastructure-mono, os-ios, 8.0.0
  • Support filtering property names on dictionary deserialization #87868
    area-System.Text.Json, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Use proper context in initClass for GDV #87847
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Avoid reporting frozen segments in GetGenerationBounds #85727
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 679: Build ID 2208985 #87991
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Relaxing IsConnected Check for Datagram Sockets #87916
    area-System.Net.Sockets
  • [mono][tests] Parallel AOT compilation of runtime tests on iOS platforms #86089
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, area-Infrastructure-mono, os-ios, 8.0.0
  • Added Utf8.IsValid(bytes) #88004
    new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution, needs-area-label
  • Delete `GT_CNS_LNG` #85951
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Delete simple quirks left from the `ASG` removal #86726
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Fix incorrect sequence number used in NTLM signature calculation #87998
    area-System.Net.Security, community-contribution
  • [System.Numerics] Cross Product for Vector2 and Vector4 #87968
    area-System.Numerics, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Additional JsonNode functionality #87381
    area-System.Text.Json, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
